  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(int b, int min, Deck Gamedeck)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      b - initial balance introduced
      min - minimum bet allowed
      Gamedeck - Deck being used for the Game to use when initializing the new player

  • Method Details

    • plusBalance

      public void plusBalance​(double e, double d)
      Plus Balance
      Parameters:
      e - commonly will be used as the player current balance
      d - commonly will be used as the player previous bet This method adds 2 doubles, will be used for money interactions

    • minusBalance

      public void minusBalance​(double e, int d)
      Minus Balance
      Parameters:
      e - commonly will be used as the player current balance
      d - commonly will be used as the player previous bet This method subtracts 2 doubles, will be used for money interactions
